remarks.format: ## Remarks 此结构表示 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 的.NET 投影`Duration`结构。This struct represents the .NET projection of the Windows Runtime (WinRT) `Duration` struct. 有关详细信息，请参阅[持续时间](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.duration)UWP API 参考。For more information, see [Duration](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.duration) in the UWP API reference.
